application_metadata.name: COCRDLIC - Credit Card List Program
application_metadata.description: A credit card management system component that provides functionality to list, filter, and navigate credit cards based on user permissions and search criteria. Supports pagination and allows users to view or update individual card details.

business_entities.name: CreditCard
business_entities.description: Represents a credit card in the system with associated account and status information

attributes.name: card_status
attributes.description: Current status of the credit card

business_entities.name: Account
business_entities.description: Customer account that owns one or more credit cards

business_entities.name: User
business_entities.description: System user with specific permissions and access rights

attributes.name: user_type
attributes.description: Type of user (admin or regular user)

business_rules.name: User Permission Based Card Listing
business_rules.description: The system lists credit cards based on user permissions. Admin users can view all cards when no context is passed. Non-admin users can only view cards associated with their specific account.
business_rules.logic: If user is admin and no filter context provided, display all cards. If user is not admin, restrict display to cards associated with user's account only.
actions: Display all credit cards for admin users without context
Display only account-specific cards for regular users

business_rules.name: Pagination Display Limit
business_rules.description: The system displays a maximum of 7 credit card records per page to maintain usability and screen readability.
business_rules.logic: Limit displayed records to 7 per page. Provide navigation controls for additional pages.
conditions: More than 7 records exist matching criteria

business_rules.name: Filter Application
business_rules.description: Users can filter credit card listings by account ID and/or card number. Filters can be applied independently or in combination.
business_rules.logic: Apply account ID filter if provided and valid. Apply card number filter if provided and valid. If both filters provided, apply both. If no filters provided, display all accessible cards.
conditions: Account ID filter is valid 11-digit number
Card number filter is valid 16-digit number

business_rules.name: Single Selection Enforcement
business_rules.description: Users can select only one credit card at a time for viewing or updating. Multiple selections are not permitted.
business_rules.logic: Count number of selections made. If more than one selection detected, reject and display error message.
conditions: User selects more than one card
actions: Display error message for multiple selections
Process single selection for view or update

business_rules.name: Record Exclusion Based on Filters
business_rules.description: Records that do not match the specified filter criteria are excluded from the display.
business_rules.logic: For each record, check if account ID matches filter (if provided) and card number matches filter (if provided). Exclude record if either filter fails.
conditions: Account ID filter is active and record account ID does not match
Card number filter is active and record card number does not match

business_rules.name: Page Navigation Control
business_rules.description: System controls page navigation based on current position and available records. Prevents navigation beyond first or last page.
business_rules.logic: Track current page number and record boundaries. Enable/disable navigation controls based on position. Display appropriate messages when at boundaries.
conditions: User is on first page and attempts to go to previous page
User is on last page and attempts to go to next page
More pages exist after current page
Previous pages exist before current page
actions: Display 'NO PREVIOUS PAGES TO DISPLAY' message
Display 'NO MORE PAGES TO DISPLAY' message

business_rules.name: No Records Found Handling
business_rules.description: When no records match the search criteria, system displays appropriate message to user.
business_rules.logic: After applying filters and reading records, if no records found, display 'NO RECORDS FOUND FOR THIS SEARCH CONDITION' message.

business_rules.name: Program State Initialization
business_rules.description: On first entry to program, initialize all working storage variables, set transaction context, and prepare for user interaction.
business_rules.logic: Check if program is being called for first time (EIBCALEN = 0). If yes, initialize all areas and set default values. If no, restore previous state from communication area.
conditions: Returning from detail or update program
actions: Initialize work areas to default values

validations.rule: Must be numeric and exactly 11 digits if supplied
validations.error_message: ACCOUNT FILTER,IF SUPPLIED MUST BE A 11 DIGIT NUMBER

validations.rule: Must be numeric and exactly 16 digits if supplied
validations.error_message: CARD ID FILTER,IF SUPPLIED MUST BE A 16 DIGIT NUMBER

validations.rule: Only one row can be selected at a time
Must be 'S' (Select for view), 'U' (Update), or blank
Can be blank or zeros to indicate no filter
Can be blank or zeros to indicate no filter

workflows.name: Credit Card List Display Workflow
workflows.description: Main workflow for displaying and navigating credit card listings

steps.action: Initialize program and determine entry context
Receive and validate user inputs if returning from previous interaction
Validate account ID and card number filters
Determine action based on function key pressed
Execute appropriate action
Format and send screen map with results
Return control and wait for next user action

workflows.name: Card Selection for View Workflow
workflows.description: Process flow when user selects a card for viewing details

steps.action: Validate that exactly one card is selected with 'S' code
Retrieve selected card's account ID and card number
Prepare communication area with card details
Transfer control to card detail view program (COCRDSLC)

workflows.name: Card Selection for Update Workflow
workflows.description: Process flow when user selects a card for updating

steps.action: Validate that exactly one card is selected with 'U' code
Retrieve selected card's account ID and card number
Prepare communication area with card details
Transfer control to card update program (COCRDUPC)

workflows.name: Forward Pagination Workflow
workflows.description: Process flow for navigating to next page of results

steps.action: Start browsing from last displayed card key
Read next records applying filters
Collect up to 7 matching records
Check if more records exist beyond current page
Update page tracking information
Display results on screen

workflows.name: Backward Pagination Workflow
workflows.description: Process flow for navigating to previous page of results

steps.action: Start browsing from first displayed card key
Read previous records applying filters
Collect up to 7 matching records in reverse order
Update page tracking information
Display results on screen

integrations.name: CARDDAT File Access
integrations.purpose: Read credit card records for display and filtering

integrations.name: Card Detail View Program (COCRDSLC)
integrations.purpose: Display detailed information for selected credit card
trigger_conditions: User selects card with 'S' action code

integrations.name: Card Update Program (COCRDUPC)
integrations.purpose: Allow user to update credit card information
trigger_conditions: User selects card with 'U' action code

integrations.name: Menu Program (COMEN01C)
integrations.purpose: Return to main menu when user exits card listing

authentication_requirements: User must be signed on to system
User type must be determined before card access
Admin users can view all cards without account context
Regular users restricted to their associated account cards

error_handling.condition: Account ID filter is not numeric or not 11 digits
error_handling.business_impact: User cannot filter by account ID, search results may be too broad
error_handling.suggested_action: Display error message, highlight account ID field, position cursor for correction

error_handling.condition: Card number filter is not numeric or not 16 digits
error_handling.business_impact: User cannot filter by card number, search results may be too broad
error_handling.suggested_action: Display error message, highlight card number field, position cursor for correction

error_handling.condition: User selects more than one card for action
error_handling.business_impact: System cannot process multiple selections simultaneously
error_handling.suggested_action: Display error message, highlight all selected rows, require user to select only one

error_handling.condition: User enters action code other than 'S', 'U', or blank
error_handling.suggested_action: Display error message, highlight invalid selection field

error_handling.condition: No credit cards match the specified filter criteria
error_handling.business_impact: User cannot view or work with cards, may indicate incorrect filter or no cards exist
error_handling.suggested_action: Display 'NO RECORDS FOUND FOR THIS SEARCH CONDITION' message, allow user to modify filters

error_handling.condition: User attempts to navigate beyond last page
error_handling.suggested_action: Display 'NO MORE PAGES TO DISPLAY' message, disable next page navigation

error_handling.condition: User attempts to navigate before first page
error_handling.suggested_action: Display 'NO PREVIOUS PAGES TO DISPLAY' message, disable previous page navigation

error_handling.condition: Error occurs while reading card data file
error_handling.business_impact: Cannot retrieve card information, system functionality impaired
error_handling.suggested_action: Display error message with file operation details, log error for technical review
